website_summaries.verdict: The Monoprice 8247 does the impossible by offering a competent 5.1 speaker system for less than $100, setting a new standard for ultrabudget speakers.
pros: The Monoprice 8247 is one of the least expensive 5.1 speaker systems we've ever seen
The system includes four small two-way satellite speakers with swivel wall-mounts, a center channel, and a compact powered 8-inch subwoofer
Most importantly, it actually sounds pretty good, as long as you're not expecting miracles
cons: The plastic speaker cabinets don't compare to the nicer finishes on more expensive systems
And if you can spend more money, the Energy Take Classic 5.1 and Pioneer SP-PK21BS are better in just about every way

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Everything said about these speakers is true. Great performance for the price. They sound like a much more expensive set. One thing I did have 1 speaker dead out of the box, the maker wasn't interested in getting me a replacement quickly they wanted to take their own time. Amazon as always was excellent they sent me a whole new set overnight and I sent these back.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Subwoofer died after <2yrs
customer_reviews.text: Wired this system up to a JVC receiver, worked great until the subwoofer stopped working. Powers up but blows the built-in fuse immediately. All the circuits and components are glued to the mounting plate--probably a good thing for vibration but gives me no hope of repairing whatever part is short circuiting. Still gets three stars because it sounded good while it lasted and the fuse worked as designed so my house didn't burn down.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great looks, don’t trust the used option.
customer_reviews.text: I would give the performance of these speakers 5-stars, but unfortunately they were not “used-like new” when the arrived. There were big scuffs and dings on the speakers, but most egregiously, two of the three screws holding the subwoofer in the housing were missing and it just flopped out when I pulled it out of the box. I’m not expecting perfection when I buy used, but that seems a bit excessive. Still though, once I replaced the screws and touched up the marks, I was very pleased with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Sean R. Maloney

customer_reviews.title: This is not a home theater system
customer_reviews.text: This product claims to be a "home theater system in a box". It is not. It is jut a bunch a speakers. You will have to purchase something else like a receiver to even use them. As an example I purchased the Logitech home theater system. All the speakers run back directly to the subwoofer. The subwoofer plugs directly into your TV nothing extra is needed to use them. These are a just a bunch of speakers. I now will have to purchase a receiver or something else to even use them. Also does not come with any speaker cables. Total rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jaus

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These speakers produce great sound for the price. However, if you attempt to mount them on the wall/ceiling, you will find that the part you screw your mounts into is not attached very well and can unscrew when attempting to remove the mounts, requiring disassembly to fix. If this design flaw was fixed (ie. if they apply some permanent thread lock to the threads in the factory such as Loctite Threadlocker Red 271), I wouldn't have anything to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle H. Tafoya

customer_reviews.title: amazing!
customer_reviews.text: So I had this huge amazing paragraph that said how in love I am of these speakers and it somehow got highlighted and deleted! So I am not going to write that whole thing over again. Just know these Kick @#$ Let them stretch their speaker legs for about 50 hours then go hog wild! The bass is exquisite considering the speakers are no where near as expensive as some speakers out there that don't give no where near as good quality sound as these do! Definitely have a good receiver already and you will mostly likely need the 2 rca to 1 adapter as this doesn't come with one!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.text: I was setting up my home office and wanted something better than PC speakers. This little system paired with an amp works great. Honestly if you need to blast your audio so everyone in the house can hear it, or if you are an audiophile then you should not be looking at this price range. For the average person I would say, spend the money on a decent amp, cables (very important) and get this system. One thing I noted is that the SW can at times take a few seconds to kick in, but I think that may be related to my setup and the frequency I have setup.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great sound
customer_reviews.text: I got this to pair with my Denon 7.2 home theater, and it's great! Satellite speakers are solid, responsive, and a great value. I already have a bigger subwoofer, so I swapped it out, but I use the sub that came with it as an add-on to my 2.0 system
customer_reviews.author: scott wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Good speakers for a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: You really can't beat the price for these things. Would I be able to tell the difference between these and a $1000 set of speakers?? Maybe, but I don't notice any problems with these and I didn't break the bank. Only thing I don't care for is the shiny "Monoprice" name on the speakers, especially since I mounted mine hanging upside down from the ceiling. However a black sharpie took care of the name easily and now it's virtually unnoticable. I'd buy these again if I needed anymore.
customer_reviews.author: TimG

customer_reviews.title: 10+ Stars. I'm a musician. Picky about sound. These are the best
customer_reviews.text: This has that perfect sound that you are looking for. I am a musician. I am very picky about sound and I highly recommend this. Deep quality bass that will shake the house if you want it to. Real sounding movies from lows to mids to hi. Amazing price. Go for it. These are the best. I have an Onkyo surround sound receiver powering these.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Sub surprise
customer_reviews.text: This system came with wall mounts for the two front speakers, and the two rear speakers. I had to make a mount for The front speaker. The subwoofer does NOT have a simple “sub line in” option. This would be nice since most of the receivers have the “sub out”, or “pre-sub out” option. Needless to say I ended up using a Sony sub I had from a previous system. The high sounds are perfect! Overall a great buy for a smaller living room with low ceiling height 8’-9’.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Best cheap system that kicks BOSE butt!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely incredible speaker set. Pair these with two relatively inexpensive in-ceiling speakers (also availavle on amazon) and a certified refurbished Onkyo TXNR676 and you can now play Atmos, Vision, HDR and every other brand new amazing technologies for INSANELY less $$ than "atmos" branded systems. Add in the Xbox 1 X (Or even a regular Xbox One If its only Atmos you're interested in) and you're all set! My one grievance is that you're limited to one subwoofer. For some this is fine but (as confirmed through contacting them directly) they DO NOT sell the same sub in this kit separately which is a huge bummer if you want two matching for your setup!!!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: ... with my projector home theater setup and they work great! The clarity and volume is great
customer_reviews.text: I got these to go with my projector home theater setup and they work great! The clarity and volume is great. They aren't too big or look out of place. The satellite speakers fit on my stands where my old Vizio speakers were. I had to get creative with how they stated given the speakers Coke with a swivel like handle that's suppose to help you set them up to something but it honestly made it slightly more difficult.
customer_reviews.author: faraway12

customer_reviews.title: Great price / Not for large rooms (mine is a about 20’x14’x9’)
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to the surround sound world. Bass is super good, but the smaller speakers are not good for a large room (mine is a about 20’x14’x9’). The center speaker is small. It makes the dialog a bit hard to hear. Good starter speakers to learn receiver settings and limitations. I’m still working on getting the dialog crystal clear for DVD and Netflix. Works best on All Channel setting. If anything buy this just for the bass, because those things are expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Center speaker stopped working within 3 months. Sent email to manufacturer, no response.
customer_reviews.author: timothy s neubauer

customer_reviews.title: ' The fact is it's a bad transformer that makes so much noise anytime the power ...
customer_reviews.text: The subwoofer has a more than noticeable hum. Quite loud. I've been in contact with monoprice for two weeks over the matter and have been given the run around. 'Have you tried this. Tried that?' The fact is it's a bad transformer that makes so much noise anytime the power is plugged in I leave it unplugged from the wall. They said they'd give me a return label for shipping but nothing's happened in two weeks and several emails. I thought I'd get to show off my new home theater setup for family next week but now I just hope to return this damn thing.
customer_reviews.author: Medic720

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker Set for the Money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great 5.1 speaker set for the money. I’ve had this system for just over a year with no issues. The sound coming from the system (paired with an Onkyo TX-NR609) is great and rivals speaker systems three to four times the price. The included speaker mounts was an added bonus that allows easy walk mounting, however, the center channel speaker does not include wall mounts. The only thing I cannot speak for is the subwoofer as I already had a 12in subwoofer from Monoprice so I never even hooked it up. Still at that price point the five speakers in itself are a value and more than worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Sounded great at first until they quit working less than six months later
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter at college. I installed them for her and they sounded great when I first hooked them up in December. Less than six months later, the subwoofer stops working and the two surround speakers no longer work. I thought this was an outstanding bargain at $100. I normally buy nice speakers like Bose or Polk. The sound was very comparable, but her space was a little smaller, so the sound was great for the space she was in. I recommend spending a little more and getting far better quality and reliable speakers. Was able to find some Polk Audio with Subwoofer for $275. Not much more and much better quality and reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Onstott

customer_reviews.title: NO Banana plugs needed!
customer_reviews.text: First, I know the back of the speakers look like they need/use banana plugs. But they do NOT! Do NOT buy banana plugs! Otherwise, I agree with the others. It is a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: lalawsooner

customer_reviews.title: Easy, inexpensive and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a 10 year old system. I didn't want to spend a lot, so I took a chance. It works great! The only issue I had is that after about a month, one of the front speakers started sounding distorted. I chatted with Amazon and within moments, they offered to send another one. No hassles. This is why I love buying amazon sponsored products. GREAT customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Big Dave

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for brother-in-law's basement man cave.
customer_reviews.text: Center channel should be mountable and have a bracket included like the other speakers. Terminals should be screw-down or banana clip acceptable as opposed to spring terminals. Sound quality is good, bass output is decent. Cost is phenomenal for what you get. Amazing price. Easy installation, even for an amateur.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby C.

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the quality for this price
customer_reviews.text: Really great set for the price. People are always surprised when I tell them I have a Monoprice brand system. Haven't had any issues. Good bass and clear sound. I would buy again if I had to or recommend to others. Hooked up to my Yamaha receiver for music but primarily DTS/5.1 movies. I've had the set for about over 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Steven E.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: I connected this to my Sony receiver, which kept going into protect mode with my old speakers, and I'm thrilled with my purchase. The subwoofer sounds so nice and deep. The other three speakers complement my ceiling speakers so nicely. I plan to use the remaining two speakers in my bedroom. For the price, this is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I bought mid April and here it is the end of June and one of the speakers has gone out, which throws off the entire system. 2.5 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: definitely sounds better than their price would suggest
customer_reviews.text: these sound far better than i expected since i got them refurbed for $60. watched "fury" on them right away, and holy CRAP they sounded good, especially in the tank battles. master and commander also sounded absolutely terrific. crystal clear sound and responsive bass.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Paradis

customer_reviews.title: Great system for the price or at three times the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great system for the price or at three times the price. Well built, great definition and soundstage spacing. Even in my less than ideal set up (over a corner fireplace in a larger room) I get great surround sound. Plenty of bass and excellent detail. The only one I like better is the Energy Classic but it wasn't available when I bought this system.
customer_reviews.author: Pirate_Princess3

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting miracles at this price point, but these come close! Far better than expected, and a huge upgrade from the last set I had. The only ding is minor: the center speaker has no mount so I put up a shelf for it. Aside from that, really good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Adams

customer_reviews.title: Like Others... Sounded great, But... after maybe 2-4 hours of mid volume use, one speaker is blown
customer_reviews.text: One of the speakers blew within 6 months. Very Little usage. I mostly game in headphones and rarely get to use my speakers (when I have the house to myself)... I don't even listen to it very loud. I didn't try to contact Monoprice because it seems clear in reading others review that It would basically be a waste of time. I'm spending this time on a review to tell others to think twice... Cheap, yes... Decent looking, Yes... Sounded pretty good at first, Yes... Died quickly, now sound like junk... YES. Frustrated... Yes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heath

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, Great look
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, Great look, Great price... and works well with the Denon AVR-S510BT 5.2 Channel Full 4K Ultra HD AV Receiver with Bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Works, great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This system is very solid for the price. Using it in a small basement (Maybe 9 ft between TV and rear wall) for gaming, movies, etc. Powerful sub. Sound is clear.
customer_reviews.author: linksus maximus

customer_reviews.title: Nice little budget sound system
customer_reviews.text: This home theater system was pretty good as in quality, sound was okay, never took it to the max due to living in apartment. The subwoofer was a slammer though, on one notch I swear my downstairs neighbors complained about it, wish I knew more about audio to provide more info. The center speaker has no way to mount it, so we but it on a shelf with the PS3. No wires included either, needed RCA, RCA to to Sub and Speaker wires.
customer_reviews.author: Kaydoo

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the money
customer_reviews.text: These little speakers sound better than I thought they would. Works great in our small TV room. Wouldn’t have the punch needed for a larger room, though.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sieben

customer_reviews.title: Great little and inexpensice 5.1 surround sound system.
customer_reviews.text: I have the Energy surround sound system in another room. I prefer this system. The sound is exceptional and the price cannot be beaten.
customer_reviews.author: frenchy

customer_reviews.title: ... settled on these as the price was just too good and the reviews were
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace some home theater speakers on a budget and had considered a few options but settled on these as the price was just too good and the reviews were, for the most part, excellent. I am very glad I did as they sound great, and if you need a set of speakers to get your home theater setup going you can make plenty of worse choices than these. At some point I intend to upgrade the fronts to floor standing speakers but for now, these work great with my Onkyo HT-RC460 receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Sensible

customer_reviews.title: Best 5.1 Speaker Set under $100!
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the center speaker because it was defective, but Monoprice didn't actually make me return it. They sent out a new center speaker the same day and it arrived in 3 business days. These speakers are priced aggressively for their performance and you'd be hard pressed to find a better set of speakers for the same price. If anyone asked me about 5.1 speakers for under $100, I wouldn't hesitate to recommend these as the performance to dollar ratio is just off the charts.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M. Hamling

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: I have it for a year now,amazing sound ,loud enough( in war with my neighbors) ,very easy to set up and price is unbeatable
customer_reviews.author: Milovan ilic

customer_reviews.title: Has been working perfectly for us
customer_reviews.text: We needed this for a project we're working on and despite some of the bad reviews, it's been working perfectly for us since day one. Not one issue at all. A real value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Marie

customer_reviews.title: dont listen to the bad review
customer_reviews.text: Before I got the product I read a lot of bad reviews about it. But when it arrives,d and I hooked it up; it was terrific. I loved it. Fantastic quality and price. if you are low on cash and craving form cinema-quality speaker, this is a gotta have.
customer_reviews.author: Henrique silva ribeiro

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about these speakers. I question whether I would prefer a sub that wasn't downward firing, especially being on the second floor. I feel like this design would penetrate the floor with bass more than other designs, but they say bass is omni-directional, so maybe it doesn't matter. These speakers are more than enough to meet my needs. I have them paired with an Onkyo TX-SR333, and I cannot imagine why I would ever spend more for a more expensive setup.
customer_reviews.author: GoTarO

customer_reviews.title: Bumping!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are no joke. For the price of this set, I would buy 2 sets if I had the space. Great paired with my Sony 5.1 receiver. Can bump Three Six Mafia (best for testing out the bass) like high end speakers. If you're looking for a budget set, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: M V

customer_reviews.title: Missing Information
customer_reviews.text: The description was not as accurate as it should have been. Not knowing very much about this type of thing, from the description I felt that all I needed for this to work came with it. That is not the case. You have to also purchase a receiver separately and they all cost as much and much more than this product. The fact that a receiver is needed as well should be made very clear in the product information.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Colter

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was excellent, we lost everything in the Paradise Camp Fire, and I'm definitely going to buy this surround unit again.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Ziviello-Howell

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my first surround sound system and I have to say that it is great for the price! I wasn’t looking for big sound, but it does have kick. My bedroom isn’t huge 15 x 25.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Surround Sound
customer_reviews.text: These speakers helped me complete my home entertainment System. They were a great value and sound awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Billy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great price, Surround sound set up in a snap
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new receiver for a new home theatre. I didn’t want to spend a fortune so I got this. It is perfect. Great sound! Only issue was that one of the speakers stopped working. Found replacement on eBay.
customer_reviews.author: David Lee Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Big bang for the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: These surround sound speakers are better than I thought they would be. They sound great when watching movies. They are not the best when it comes to music, I'm still playing with the volume and frequency settings on the sub to get the best sound. I wouldn't hesitate to purchase these again, they are absolutely worth the money I didn't on them.
customer_reviews.author: Rotor Head

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I'm happy with the system. It sounds good with both music and tv/movies. There are better systems out there, but I just wanted something cheap/decent for the man cave and this fit the bill. Mine came with the newer designed speakers that have the MP logo on the grilles instead of monoprice being spelled out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A well-rounded speaker kit.
customer_reviews.text: I used the four smaller speakers as surround sound speakers powered by wireless amps, they worked perfectly for this purpose. The center speaker I used for the center channel, and got two Polk floor speakers for left and right. The sub works great too.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Saunders

customer_reviews.title: High quality sound, low price!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for about a year and a half. I got them paired with a Yamaha RX-V375 and cannot be happier. The quality, sound wise, compared to the price I paid for these back in December of 2013 is unremarkable. In the time i've owned this set i have not experienced any issue at all. Highly recommend this product !
customer_reviews.author: SuperSnyp

customer_reviews.title: Speaker Threaded Insert, Mount. Screw size
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Recently, the threaded insert at the back of the speakers are not as described. They are actually M6, but mentioned as 1/4". Because of this i had to change my entire system. You would not find a mount for these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Santhavel Thangavel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: HOOKUP WAS EASY AND THE SOUND IS GREAT. ONLY WHISH THAT THE SUBWOOFER DID NOT SAY ON ALL THE TIME.
customer_reviews.author: george evans

customer_reviews.title: Good deal on a starter 5.1 system.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this speaker system. Very reasonable price and non-obtrusive design. This is my first set of speakers purchased for a home theater. I relied on a great many reviews across the web to select the speakers, as I am unable to audition audio equipment in person. This set of speakers comes highly recommended as a great deal on a reasonable starter. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Munkiis

customer_reviews.title: These speakers put out some great sound at this price point
customer_reviews.text: These speakers put out some great sound at this price point. Sure, they're not as good as higher end models, but they will fill up your space with sound at a very reasonable price. We actually use them in our shop. I was looking for some bookshelf speakers and those have just gone out of fashion, so I grabbed this set and have no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: This is a great value. Sounds like it costs much
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value. Sounds like it costs much, much more, and is perfect for small to medium-sized home theater rooms. Highly rated on many platforms. Crisp highs, and better bass than you would expect from it's powered sub.
customer_reviews.author: Vance Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pairs up nicely with my Panasonic receiver
customer_reviews.text: I give it 5 stars for the value. Understanding that this is not a high end product, I have been pleasantly surprised by the quality. Im getting a little swishing sound from the sub but im still dialing in the sound settings. Pairs up nicely with my Panasonic receiver. Just needed a Y adapter for sub out but I was prepared for that. Would recommend a SPL and calibration disk to really enhance your experience. Definitely would recommend to consumers looking for a starter set.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT......so far
customer_reviews.text: These were delivered yesterday and I set them up with my Onkyo receiver. So far, they sound great. I'm not an audiophile by any means but this was an awesome upgrade to my existing setup and you can't beat that price. I already had a subwoofer but the Monoprice sub is 10x better. The bass was very deep and much louder than my other sub, which was the same size. I will try to remember to update this review after a couple of weeks playing with my new speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby C.

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the price
customer_reviews.text: So good that I bought it again to set up in my bedroom as well (albeit directly from Monoprice the second time around because it was cheaper)
customer_reviews.author: Cameron J. Collins

customer_reviews.title: and I really like that they included the brackets
customer_reviews.text: The auto on/off feature on the subwoofer turns it off a bit too quickly, so if you leave it enabled the bass sometimes takes a second or two to come back on. Other than that, they work well, and I really like that they included the brackets.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried that these would not meet my needs for my home theater because they are so affordable. I hooked them up last night and all my concerns were completely gone! These are great speakers for the price, great bass, mid and high level sound. I'm no audiophile but these speakers produce rich, full sound and are very affordable. I was not disappointed and I don't think you will be either.
customer_reviews.author: Shoop05

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Only gave 4 stars due to in break in period still. But am liking so far. Great system have only a Martin Logan MLT-2 system to compare to, would not say equivalent, but for the price and sound so far it is very much worth it
customer_reviews.author: Davy C.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisified
customer_reviews.text: It's an awsome deal for quality and sound. Only wish the center would have also had some wall bracket, but it is a complete box for install.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Kings

customer_reviews.title: Holy hole in a donut! These are amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I would put these up there in quality with a system 3 times the price.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne M. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. I notice if I set the volume too loud from my receiver the speakers will randomly pop.
customer_reviews.author: shredder

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: If u are looking for a sound system and not a huge price this works well I have it down stairs at my bar and it rocks out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big sound.
customer_reviews.text: Made my home theatre come to life. Sound way better than the Onkyo speakers they replace.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W.

customer_reviews.title: Good job Monoprice
customer_reviews.text: I would have gone w/ 4 1/2 stars. Great sounding speakers. A slight hum in the sub is my only complaint. I do have larger front Rt and Lt and Center speakers - w/ the sub and backs from this set. As is I think it would sound good. You do need an additional receiver/amplifier, but this will sound FAR better than a all in one surround from a box-shop.
customer_reviews.author: ryan scacci

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic system
customer_reviews.text: The satellite and center speakers are really high quality. The sub works great but if you’re one of those people who wants enough bass to deafen Manhattan, Queens, and Long Island for a month, then you’re gonna need another sub. The bottom line is, for under a hundred bucks, you can’t beat this system.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Chesney

customer_reviews.title: Great 5.1 Speakers for the Ears and Wallet
customer_reviews.text: These speakers make watching movies very enjoyable. There's more richness and impact to the sound in contrast to the built-in tv speakers. For anyone looking to improve their in home theater experience on a budget with great sound, these speakers are the ones to get!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and more bass than I can use in ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound and more bass than I can use in my 21'x 13' liiving room! I thought that I could run my sound to the Woofer shown and run all of my speakers out of it but it doesn't work that way. I still had to keep my old sound system to run the speakers out of and split the audio cable for the second bass
customer_reviews.author: Corrections Sergeant

customer_reviews.title: Much more than I expected. Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Don't let the low price deceive you. This is an amazing product that out performs others in blind tests. I could not believe sound quality. I have mine wall mounted with the included brackets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the cheap price this is a nice set of speakers
customer_reviews.text: I looked around for a reasonably priced set of speakers for a Sony reciever that I purchased. Most stores that I went to were selling soundbars but I prefer to actually have satellite speakers. This set works as advertised and for the price is very hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Sekou Banner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound for the price. Can only say all reviews on amazon that were positive for this were spot on. If you have a budget but want great sound, you will NOT be disappointed. For this price I don't freak out when the kids turn it on or turn it up. Went through break in period though.
customer_reviews.author: steven james orcutt

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for any audio, any sound; a must to have system
customer_reviews.text: For sound of any kind and for distribution of same within a room, this is a fantastic set of speakers. We use it for movies as well as music of all kinds. It blows the mind of of our grand daughter when she looks at cartoons and many times trying to figure out from where the sound comes.
customer_reviews.author: Klintehamn

customer_reviews.title: These boys are magic.
customer_reviews.text: For about $100 these boys are magic. Audio junkies these are not for you. but if you are a audio junkie why are you even looking at $100 setup. There are absolutely fabulous for what they are :)
customer_reviews.author: arthur caleb robertson

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Impressed by the sound on these. An incredible value for the price. Our 5.1 home theater system is very well equipped now. We've never turned them anything near their maximum volume. I'm impressed anyone could take that. Up to the volume we can handle, there is no distortion.
customer_reviews.author: R. R. Texas

customer_reviews.title: Needs additional reciever
customer_reviews.text: The item did not come with installation instructions and I was not aware you needed a n additional receiver to connect to the TV. I am currently looking for a receiver and would like to know what I should get
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Value
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a really good set of entry level surround speakers. A good starting point for adding 5.1 surround to your home theater when used with a decent reciever (I bought them with a Denon AVR-S500BT reciever that I'm also quite happy with and automatically calibrates the speakers with a mic attachment). Loses one star because two of the screws that attach the speakers to the mounting brackets were too short and therefore useless. Easy enough to replace with a regular screw, but not great quality assurance in that respect.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W. Maret

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I gave the sub-woofer away because I didn't need it, but the satellite speakers are great. Quality sound without gouging your wallet.
customer_reviews.author: inimicalnibel

customer_reviews.title: Really good speakers
customer_reviews.text: The satellite speakers are great and at a really good price. The sub is better than you would expect for the price range but does distort a little once you crank the volume really high, but other than that, it reproduces really good sound and a good deep bass. Two years later and these still sound really good and more importantly, they all still work.
customer_reviews.author: Bahamian shopper

customer_reviews.title: Stop take there money...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this in and on 2 different TVs. Evidently I don't have all the pieces. You only sent me one cord. And the instructions that you gave me that came with it. It doesn't work on any of the TVs I tried it on. Thanks for nothing!
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound.  Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the quality of this system. After about a week and a half of use, the system is warming up nicely. The speakers sound great and are well-crafted. The subwoofer has punch, without being obnoxious. For a system in this price range, it's hard to beat! Set up was easy and it looks great in my den. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Stubby

customer_reviews.title: clarity enough bass with powered sub. You get more than expected for price.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality will be better than expected once tweaked on 5.1 amp. Small but heavy speakers. Yep. Subwoofer great for movies and games. Just had to set to small speakers and eq. Clarity with slight bass and plenty in powered sub.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good satellites and center, sad sub
customer_reviews.text: The satellites and center are great, good sound and quality construction. Love the mounting brackets and the push style wire connection, however the sub is a major let down its distorts before delivery of any sort of bass notes.
customer_reviews.author: ARV5150

customer_reviews.title: i only hook up left right and center and listening to music is awesome great not just for the price
customer_reviews.text: Dont think too much get it this is a steal for 100 bucks... i only hook up left right and center and listening to music is awesome great not just for the price!! Dont spend 2,3,4 or 500... get this and an av receiver 200 bucks in general and u have an awesome setup!!
customer_reviews.author: CAA Garage Doors

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, this is hands down insane bang for buck. Sound is incredible for the low price!
customer_reviews.author: J. Sorbello

customer_reviews.title: Weak sub
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit, for the money its great! Solid sount from the center, left, rights and surrounds. My only drawback is the sub. Its weak. But overall , great for the price. And hey.. You can always replace the sub.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Shoop

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: The review by C L Hinds almost says it all., only thing I wish I had know is that you need a RCA Y splitters to connect the subwoofer because it has Red/White separate but on most receivers is together.
customer_reviews.author: a1ain

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level speaker set
customer_reviews.text: Look no further for a great entry level set of speakers. I have used them daily for the last 2 months and they have been great for gaming, movies, and music. I will eventually upgrade these but do not be afraid if you are looking for an entry level set.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: KICKING BASS
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality from the satellites is pretty good... but dat subwoofer is something else. This is the first system I've bought that wasn't prewired, but I got an AV receiver and speaker wire for it and I am pretty impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: I'm no audio junkie but this was a great buy! Everything looks great
customer_reviews.text: I'm no audio junkie but this was a great buy! Everything looks great, especially the subwoofer. I live in an apartment so I wanted a system with bass but nothing too crazy that my neighbors would be bothered by it. I have this paired up with my onkyo system.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice speakers for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice speakers for the price though the sub can be a little muddy but clears up with tweaking.
customer_reviews.author: F. Redmon

customer_reviews.title: Nice, clear sound with house-shaking capabilities from the included ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality speakers for a reasonable price. Installed in my home theater and I have no complaints whatsoever. Nice, clear sound with house-shaking capabilities from the included subwoofer. Had them for over a year using them roughly 10 hours a week and I haven't had a single problem
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: AWesome speakers! Awesome sound! Can't believe how good these speakers are for the price. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew & Melissa

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: The subwoofer doesn't sound good at all but the other speakers sounds good
customer_reviews.author: Emorrick hickey

customer_reviews.title: Love these cheap speakers
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat Monoprice speakers. Great sound for what it is. This setup will not wake the neighbors, but will wake the kids. Good build quality. Overall, very happy with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: For the price they can't be beat!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers replaced my 1997 Aiwa speakers, yeah talk about a major difference. I didn't want to spend major bucks to just enjoy small town movie theater quality and with the positive reviews I went with these. Not a bad investment!
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Review  missing part.
customer_reviews.text: Missing 1 speaker mounting screw and I wish that the center speaker had optional mounting bracket holes. Also Purchased this used and then a few days later found it brand new for cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Churchill

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers great price
customer_reviews.text: I love these speakers easy to install and sound great. They are heavy which is usually good when dealing with speakers they sound better that my Boston speakers
customer_reviews.author: Mike Davenport

customer_reviews.title: The speakers sound great. One problem is connecting hole for the screw ...
customer_reviews.text: The speakers sound great. One problem is connecting hole for the screw located on the back of the speakers. The hole is a metric size, which took me some time to discover.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Good speakers
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Only gave it a 4 because one of threads on the speaker was messed up so it made it harder to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Lenhaus1

product_meta.title: Monoprice 5.1 Channel Home Theater Satellite Speakers And Subwoofer - Black
product_meta.description: Style:5.1 Channel| Size:W/8in Sub| Configuration:SingleGet everything you need for a great sounding home theater speaker setup in a single box! You get four satellite speakers and a center channel speaker for the mid- and high-range audio signals, plus an 8-Inch powered subwoofer to handle the low frequencies. All the speakers come with an attractive black finish and convenient spring-loaded signal connectors. The center speakers use two 3-Inch shielded mid-range cones, while the satellites employ one 3-Inch cone and a 1/2-Inch dome tweeter. However, don't let the small size fool you! These 8 ohm speakers will handle up to 125 watts of power from your home theater receiver at frequencies from 150 Hz to 20 kHz. The subwoofer is powered by a 60 watt (RMS) amplifier, driving a downward firing 8-Inch cone. It can take either line or speaker-level inputs, so can be used with any amplifier, even older amps without dedicated subwoofer outputs. The subwoofer handles frequencies between 50 Hz to 250 Hz and includes adjustable crossover frequency and volume balance controls. Also included in the box are four C brackets for mounting the satellite speakers to the wall and the necessary hardware for mounting the speakers to the brackets. A pair of plastic feet to properly orient the face of the center speaker is also included. Note that you will need to provide your own hardware for mounting the C brackets to the wall or other vertical surface. Don't let the low price fool you! This speaker system sounds great and will fill your room with high-quality, full-spectrum sound! Note: The speaker wire connectors on each unit comfortably accept a maximum 16 gauge speaker wire. For best results use pin-type speaker plugs to make the speaker connections and banana or pin-type plugs to connect the wires to your amplifier.
feature_bullets: Surround yourself in high-fidelity with the Monoprice 5.1-channel Home Theater Speaker System!

This speaker system features four satellite speakers and a center channel speaker for the mid- and high-range audio signals, plus an 8" powered subwoofer to handle the low frequencies. All the speakers come with an attractive black finish and convenient spring-loaded signal connectors.

The center speakers use two 3" shielded mid-range cones, while the satellites employ one 3" cone and a 1/2" dome tweeter. However, don't let the small size fool you! These 8 ohm speakers will handle up to 125 watts of power from your home theater receiver at frequencies from 150 Hz to 20 kHz.

The subwoofer is powered by a 60 watt (RMS) amplifier, driving a downward firing 8" cone. It can take either line or speaker-level inputs, so can be used with any amplifier, even older amps without dedicated subwoofer outputs. The subwoofer handles frequencies between 50 Hz to 250 Hz and includes adjustable crossover frequency and volume balance controls.

Also included in the box are four C brackets for mounting the satellite speakers to the wall and the necessary hardware for mounting the speakers to the brackets. A pair of plastic feet to properly orient the face of the center speaker is also included. Note that you will need to provide your own hardware for mounting the C brackets to the wall or other vertical surface.
